title: Macbook A1708 disable some modules
message: Hi, I need to disable wifi and bluetooth on macbook A1708, can you help, what element to desolder for that?

title: Macbook A1708 disable some modules
message:
For WiFi, short AP_RESET_L to ground.
Check if system work without U3770, without Bluetooth.

U3780 could be also removed and test if works stable without WiFi.
